com.aspose.words
Class LayoutFlow

java.lang.Object
    com.aspose.words.LayoutFlow

public class LayoutFlow 
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class containing constants. Determines the flow of the text layout in a textbox.
See Also:
TextBox.LayoutFlow
